name: 101 Riddles
description:
"101 riddles" is a simple yet hallenging word-riddles game, trying to trick your mind.

The riddles inside are a mix of simple, hard, tricky, funny ones giving you a dose of entertainment and variaty.

I hope you will enjoy playing it 

Happy riddles-solving! :P

You can download the game by vising the google link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imajester_apps.hundred_and_one...
